entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 9.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Periods of rain beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm in the morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late in the morning and in the afternoon. Local rainfall amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
